name: Flux.1
description: The new open-weight state of the art for image generation. Unmatched prompt adherence and visual fidelity.

name: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
description: Anthropic’s most intelligent model. Exceptional at coding, nuance, and complex reasoning tasks.

name: Krea AI
description: Real-time AI generation and enhancement. Paint with AI in your browser with zero latency.

name: Sora 2
description: OpenAI’s world simulator. Generates photorealistic video up to 60s with complex camera motion.

name: Grok 2
description: Real-time intelligence with access to the X platform. Uncensored, witty, and now multimodal.

name: Midjourney v7
description: The aesthetic gold standard. Now with 3D texture generation and improved character consistency.

name: Llama 3.2
description: Meta’s open vision-language model. Running locally on edge devices with multimodal capabilities.

name: Cursor
description: The AI-first code editor. Built on VS Code, powered by Claude 3.5 and custom context awareness.

name: Masterpiece Studio Pro
description: AI-powered 3D creation suite excelling in generating and rigging custom 3D avatars.

name: Cognosys AI
description: Platform for building, deploying, and managing AI agents with advanced reasoning.

name: Haiper
description: Next-gen video generation tool specializing in realistic scenes and smooth camera motion.

name: Masterpiece X
description: AI-powered 3D creation suite for generating, rigging, and animating 3D assets. Updated with new features.

name: ReAct Agent v3
description: Advanced agent framework for complex task automation, improved reasoning, and tool integration.

name: VideoFusion Pro
description: AI video generation tool with enhanced realism, editing features, and multi-scene support.

name: Google DeepMind Genie 3
description: Generates interactive 3D environments from text prompts, including physics and memory.

name: Moltbot
description: Self-hosted, proactive open-source AI assistant for executing real-world tasks on user's hardware.
